page.title: 10BRACKNELL SPORTS CENTRE
page.content:
{INDOOR ACTIVITIES Squash:7 courts Badminton:Badminton Hall&3M Hall Snooker:One snooker room Table tennis:One hall with 7 tables Swimming:3 pools Also facilities for:Bowls,Massage, Sauna,Solarium,Skating,Weight lifting. {OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES 'John Nike'Athletics Stadium,7 lane all-weather running track.Facilities for:Javelin,Hurdles,Discus,Hammer Thro wing,Pole Vaulting,Football,Hockey. {ANNUAL MEMBERSHIP Adults 6 Pounds,Juniors & Old aged pensioners 2 pounds 50 pence
Day rates:Adults 32pence,Junior & Old aged pensioners 21pence.Special rates for unemployed & over 50's EMMA POULTON Easthampstead Park School 2nd Year
